name: One Night with Spong 3: Rehydrated!
description:
THIS IS A JOKE GAME!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Remember the announcement I made here, about a new ONwS game? Well, that new game was gonna be a remake of ONwS 1, 2, and 3 in one package (think Super Mario All-Stars). But I've decided to release them each seperately to save time, so here we are!

HOW TO PLAY:

When Spong appears, click on him him.

When you hear Faith, click the red button on the desk

When you see Perry, click on him 3 times

When you see Ari on one of the cameras, switch or turn it off

Keep Specimen X at bay with the wind-up button on CAM 2

CREDITS:

Me - Creator of ONwS.

Destrev- Creator of Specimen X

Jotbell: Owner of Ari, Perry, and Faith, (They're real birds!)

Scott Cawthon - Creator of FNaF

ALSO CHECK OUT:

https://shoodigity.itch.io/spong-3 THE ORIGINAL GAME!

https://itch.io/c/2074959/one-night-with-spong-full-series THE REST OF THE SERIES!
